verses.verse: In the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%>, came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has been <S%H7110>severely<s%> <S%H7107>displeased<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

Therefore <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H7725>Turn<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Be you not as your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, unto whom the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H7121>cried<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; <S%H7725>Turn<s%> now from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and from your <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4611>doings<s%>: but they did not <S%H8085>hear<s%>, nor <S%H7181>listen<s%> unto <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, where are <S%H5030>they<s%>? and the prophets, do they <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>?

But my <S%H1697>words<s%> and my <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, did they not take <S%H5381>hold<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>? and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, Like as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H2161>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H1870>us<s%>, according to our ways, and according to our <S%H4611>doings<s%>, so has he dealt with <S%H6213>us<s%>.

Upon the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H7627>Sebat<s%>, in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%>, came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and behold a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> upon a <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%>, and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> among the myrtle <S%H1918>trees<s%> that were in the <S%H4699>bottom<s%>; and <S%H310>behind<s%> him were there <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, <S%H8320>speckled<s%>, and <S%H3836>white<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H113>I<s%>, O my lord, what are <S%H4397>these<s%>? And the angel that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>me<s%>, I will show you what these be.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> among the myrtle <S%H1918>trees<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, These are they whom the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> to and forth through the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> among the myrtle <S%H1918>trees<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We have walked to and <S%H1980>forth<s%> through the <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H776>and<s%>, behold, all the earth sits <S%H3427>still<s%>, and is at <S%H8252>rest<s%>.

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, how long will you not have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and on the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, against which you have had <S%H2194>indignation<s%> these sixty and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>?
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me with <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> and <S%H5150>comfortable<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>.

So the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7121>me<s%>, Cry <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; I am <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and for <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>.

And I am <S%H1419>very<s%> <S%H7110>severely<s%> <S%H7107>displeased<s%> with the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that are at <S%H7600>ease<s%>: for I was but a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7107>displeased<s%>, and they <S%H5826>helped<s%> forward the <S%H7451>affliction<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; I am <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H7356>mercies<s%>: my <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and a <S%H6957>line<s%> shall be stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> upon <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%H7121>Cry<s%> <S%H559>yet<s%>, saying, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; My <S%H5892>cities<s%> through <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> shall yet be spread <S%H6327>abroad<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall yet <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and shall yet <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
Then lifted I <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%>, and behold <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>me<s%>, What be these? And he answered <S%H7161>me<s%>, These are the horns which have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2796>carpenters<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H935>I<s%>, What come these to <S%H6213>do<s%>? And he <S%H559>spoke<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, These are the <S%H7161>horns<s%> which have <S%H2219>scattered<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, so <S%H6310>that<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> did lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>: but these are <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2729>frighten<s%> <S%H3034>them<s%>, to cast out the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H1471>Nations<s%>, which lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H7161>horn<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to scatter <S%H2219>it<s%>.
